Kasane Teto Universal Tank Sight

Comes in 3 different sizes!

Simply unzip and place the 3 .blk files into the all_tanks folder in UserSights

(Credit goes to @SuimaRamu on Twitter for the original)

the vocaloid brainrot got to me

have fun!

#anime #teto #kasane_teto #utau #vocaloid #alltanks
#Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! #megumin #megumin_konosuba #hit #alltanks #sight

Modern Sight V3

Works with all vehicles!

INSTALL

  1. Put "ModernCrossV3.blk" in "all_tanks" folder. (WarThunder\UserSights\all_tanks)
    *If you don't have these folders just create them with the same name.
  2. Press Alt+F9 "Reload custom sight" [In Game/Test Drive].
  3. Open Options/Common Battle Settings/Use alternative sight grid and select "ModernCrossV3".


#universal #sight #alltanks #all best use with #toptier #top
